paper_abstract: A flow-condition-based interpolation finite element scheme is presented for use of triangular grids in the solution of the incompressible Navier-Stokes equations. The method provides spatially isotropic discretizations for low and high Reynolds number flows. Various example solutions are given to illustrate the capabilities of the procedure. Copyright (c) 2006 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: A flow-condition-based interpolation finite element procedure for triangular grids
